column5: This online MSc Forensic Psychology is accredited by the BPS meaning the course counts as a Stage 1 qualification for those who already hold Graduate Basis of Chartership (GBC) with the BPS.Designed for students holding a BPS-accredited undergraduate degree in Psychology, Forensic Psychology, or similar, the MSc Forensic Psychology will equip you with the academic knowledge and skills you need to work within a forensic context.You will cover areas such as:
